content.text: {"current_state": "START", "goal": "Initial state. Introduce yourself and ask the human to show the ingredients.", "valid_next_states": ["INGREDIENT_SCAN"], "user_voice": "\u4f60\u597d", "image_provided": false}

content:
{
    "speech_output": "你好！請把食材展示給我看一下。",
    "status": "USER_INTERACTION",
    "next_state": "INGREDIENT_SCAN",
    "timer_name": null,
    "timer_duration": null
}

content.text: {"current_state": "INGREDIENT_SCAN", "goal": "Analyze the image to identify ingredients. Propose a dish based on them.", "valid_next_states": ["RECIPE_CONFIRMATION", "INGREDIENT_SCAN"], "user_voice": "\u53ef\u4ee5", "image_provided": true}

content:
{
    "speech_output": "我看到你有鮭魚、牛肉、雞肉、酪梨，還有一些水果和堅果。我們可以選擇做一個健康的沙拉或是燒烤拼盤。你想試試哪一種呢？",
    "status": "USER_INTERACTION",
    "next_state": "RECIPE_CONFIRMATION",
    "timer_name": null,
    "timer_duration": null
}

content.text: {"current_state": "RECIPE_CONFIRMATION", "goal": "Negotiate with the human. If the human agrees to the dish, move to INSTRUCTION_OVERVIEW. If no, propose another dish.", "valid_next_states": ["RECIPE_CONFIRMATION", "INSTRUCTION_OVERVIEW"], "user_voice": "\u53ef\u4ee5", "image_provided": true}

content:
{
    "speech_output": "太好了！我們來開始做健康沙拉吧。我會給你看步驟。準備好開始了嗎？",
    "status": "INSTRUCTION_UPDATE",
    "next_state": "INSTRUCTION_OVERVIEW",
    "timer_name": null,
    "timer_duration": null
}

content.text: {"current_state": "INSTRUCTION_OVERVIEW", "goal": "Give a high-level overview of the instructions. If the user agrees to start, move to ACTIVE_COOKING", "valid_next_states": ["INSTRUCTION_OVERVIEW", "ACTIVE_COOKING"], "user_voice": "\u6c99\u62c9", "image_provided": false}

content:
{
    "speech_output": "好的，我們來準備這道沙拉。首先，將鮭魚、牛肉和雞肉切成小塊；接著把酪梨、檸檬和其他水果切片。然後，將所有材料放入大碗中，加入你喜歡的調味料。準備好開始了嗎？",
    "status": "USER_INTERACTION",
    "next_state": "ACTIVE_COOKING",
    "timer_name": null,
    "timer_duration": null
}

content.text:
{"current_state": "ACTIVE_COOKING", "goal": "
                The main execution loop.
                1. Instruct the user on the current step.
                2. Visually monitor progress.
                3. Answer ANY user questions.
                4. Handle timers.
                5. When the entire recipe is done, transition to FINISHED.
                ", "valid_next_states": ["ACTIVE_COOKING", "FINISHED"], "user_voice": "沙拉", "image_provided": true}

content:
{
    "speech_output": "好的，我們現在來開始製作沙拉的第一步。請將鮭魚、牛肉和雞肉切成小塊。若有任何問題，隨時告訴我！",
    "status": "MONITORING_NO_CHANGE",
    "next_state": "ACTIVE_COOKING",
    "timer_name": null,
    "timer_duration": null
}

content.text:
{"current_state": "ACTIVE_COOKING", "goal": "
                The main execution loop.
                1. Instruct the user on the current step.
                2. Visually monitor progress.
                3. Answer ANY user questions.
                4. Handle timers.
                5. When the entire recipe is done, transition to FINISHED.
                ", "valid_next_states": ["ACTIVE_COOKING", "FINISHED"], "user_voice": "準備好了", "image_provided": true}

content:
{
    "speech_output": "太好了！現在切酪梨、檸檬和其他水果，然後將它們加入碗中。完成後告訴我。",
    "status": "INSTRUCTION_UPDATE",
    "next_state": "ACTIVE_COOKING",
    "timer_name": null,
    "timer_duration": null
}
